ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.Name == 'Bank Transfer' && ( ( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Currency__c,'EUR') && ( ISBLANK(Swift_Sort_Code__c) || ISBLANK(IBAN_Account_Number__c) || NOT(ISBLANK(Bank_Account_Number__c)) || NOT(ISBLANK(Bank_Sort_Code__c)) ) ) || ( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Currency__c,'GBP') && ( ISBLANK(Bank_Account_Number__c) || ISBLANK(Bank_Sort_Code__c) || NOT(ISBLANK(Swift_Sort_Code__c)) || NOT(ISBLANK(IBAN_Account_Number__c)) ) ) ) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Claim_Status__c, 'Draft')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Claim_Status__c, 'Cancelled'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For GBP, enter only "UK Sort Code" & "UK Account Number". For EUR, enter only "BIC/Swift Code" & "IBAN"
